articles.title: ASUS Vivobook S 14X OLED and Vivobook S 16X OLED launch in Europe - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: ASUS has brought two of its latest ultrabooks to Europe, both with OLED displays. The Vivobook S 14X OLED and Vivobook S 16X OLED come with Intel Alder Lake processors and high-resolution panels. Both models tip the scales at less than 2 kg, too.

articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: The Mars Express spacecraft is finally getting a Windows 98 upgrade - The Verge
articles.description: The European Space Agency is finally upgrading its Mars Express spacecraft from Windows 98-era software. The upgrade will allow the orbiter to improve the quality of data that’s sent back to Earth.
articles.content:
Windows 98 is an alien OS in the year 2022
The Mars Express.
Image: European Space Agency
